title: Implementation of High Priority Power Sector Transmission Development Projects
decision_details:
? Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) ? Cabinet approval was granted to invite detailed technical, commercial and credit facility proposals in respect of the following projects: 

 *	Construction of Colombo B 132/11 KV Grid Substation
 *	Augmentation of Colombo A 32/11 KV Grid Substation
*	Construction of Kappalthurei Trincomalee 132/33 KV Grid Substation
		*	Installation of 2nd 220/32/33 KV Inter-Bus Transformer 				at
*	Construction of Habarana-Veyangoda Transmission Project
*	Mannar Transmission Development Project
